CustomField.description: Returns Churn Platform Transfer value for the product line item.
CustomField.formula:
/* Basically, Previous Contract ARR * Quantity is recognised as Churn. If Previous Contract Price is not specified, The percentage of the Total Sales Price ARR against teh entire Opp ARR is allocated from Oriignal Renewal ARR. If Opp ARR is 0 or Original Renewal ARR is not specified, it pulls Toatl Sales Price ARR of the item. */
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Lost"), For_Renewal__c = TRUE, TEXT(Opportunity.Reason_for_Churn__c) = "Platform Transfer" ), IF( ISBLANK(Original_Price__c), IF( ISBLANK(Opportunity.Original_Renewal_Amount__c) || Opportunity.ARR_manual__c = 0, Total_Sales_Price_ARR__c, Opportunity.Original_Renewal_ARR__c * (Total_Sales_Price_ARR__c / Opportunity.ARR_manual__c) ), Original_Price_ARR_OneOff__c * Quantity ), NULL )
CustomField.label: Churn ARR: Platfrom Transfer
